title: Singing Girl, from a photography album with images of Japan

Inscription

LRC, in negative: [71 Singing Girl.
description: seated girl wearing headdress with gold tassels and light blue pendants, light blue and gold kimono and tan obi; teaware on trays to girl\'s right; embroidered textile behind girl
